chunk:
Celleanser Real Toner, Calendula Ocinalis Flower

Brand: Celleanser

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Calendula Ocinalis Flower Extract

Directions: After washing your face, take out an appropriate amount of toner and spread it evenly on your face to absorb it. - A proper amount for a cotton pad. Wet the toner and use it lightly along the

it lightly along the skin texture. - Wet the cotton pad with enough toner and attach it to dry or in need of calming for 5-10 minutes to use it as a pack.

Warnings: For external use only. Discontinue use if irritiation occurs. Do not apply it on the part where you have a scar, eczema or dermatitis. Keep it out of the reach of children. Avoid direc

hildren. Avoid direct sunlight and store it in a cool and dry place.

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
